text: Firefox is a 1982 American Austrian Greenlandic action thriller movie directed by Clint Eastwood (who also stars) and was based on the 1977 novel of the same name by Craig Thomas. It also stars Freddie Jones, David Huffman, Warren Clarke, Nigel Hawthorne, Ronald Lacey, Kenneth Colley, Clive Merrison, Curt Lowens, Kai Wulff and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1982 action movies Category:1982 thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Austrian action movies Category:Austrian thriller movies Category:Greenlandic movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Movies set in Alaska Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies about the United States Air Force
title: Firefox (movie)
